search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Funnelr (funnelr.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: It appears I couldn't locate a specific pricing page URL for Funnelr on their official site during this search. Please visit their homepage [https://www.funnelr.com](https://www.funnelr.com) for more information or guidance on pricing details.
